extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest ZCS Releases
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest ZCS releases as noted on Zimbra Security – News & Alerts and Zimbra Security Advisories.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Volexity’s Mitigation Steps
extracted_playbook.description: Review and apply mitigation steps from Volexity’s Mass Exploitation of (Un)authenticated Zimbra RCE: CVE-2022-27925.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain and Test Incident Response Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that an incident response plan is maintained and regularly tested.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Vulnerability Management Program
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure a vulnerability management program is in place, prioritizing patch management and vulnerability scanning of known exploited vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure and Secure Internet-Facing Network Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Properly configure and secure internet-facing network devices. Do not expose management interfaces to the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Network Ports and Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused or unnecessary network ports and protocols.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Unused Network Services and Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Disable or remove unused network services and devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Adopt Zero-Trust Principles and Architecture
extracted_playbook.description: Adopt zero-trust principles, including micro-segmenting networks, enforcing phishing-resistant MFA, and restricting access to trusted devices and users.
